title: His Dirty Girl Mega Bundle #1

Please use the LOOK INSIDE feature to read a synopsis for each story, and be on the lookout for more taboo titles by Sarah Sethline, cumming very soon! This MASSIVE collection of 10 taboo tales will leave you hot and breathless. Bring it with you to bed and see how long you can go before you need to change the sheets! Contains explicit language and detailed depictions of ***FORBIDDEN LUST***.
author: Sarah Sethline
